short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notifications of new songs releases and entertainment news updates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't want to miss the latest news and song updates? Here is an extension for Google Chrome that sends you notifications for the latest news and song updates.

This Google Chrome extension will let you know about the recent news from hip-hop, albums, videos, and entertainment.

Buzzmyear is a media organization that delivers updates about new song releases, and entertainment news. 

Buzzmyear offer general and specific information about music as useful instruments that our fellow readers can read, analyze and use to create arguments at their discretion and debate whether music is a cultural expression or simple entertainment.

❤ Why use this extension? ❤

Get the latest news on hip-hop singles and albums.
Be in the know without a click.
All updates are now fully automatic.
Desktop notifications now use Chrome’s new notification center tray.
beautiful and usable news widget.
Good UX/UI designs.
